mapper.insert: insert into tbl_course (course_name, course_detail, course_img_title, course_img_detail, course_difficulty, course_start,course_start_detail,course_end,course_end_detail) values(#{courseName}, #{courseDetail}, #{courseImgTitle}, #{courseImgDetail}, #{courseDifficulty}, #{courseStart},#{courseStartDetail},#{courseEnd},#{courseEndDetail})
